channel.title: Vanessa's & Jaime's Wedding on V&J
channel.description: Recent content in Vanessa's & Jaime's Wedding on V&J

item.title: Contact
item.description: Please let us know as soon as possible if you can make it to the wedding and how many people will be joining you. We are looking forward to seeing you there! ðŸ˜Š Also feel free to share any dietary restrictions, allergies, feelings or just tell us about your day. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message

item.title: FAQs
item.description: What to wear? ðŸ‘— Dresscode for the Cityhall is formal. We’d recommend dresses for women and suits for men. Polterabend is going to be informal. We recommend to bring a jacket, as it might get a bit chilly in the evening. Where to fly to? ðŸ›« Leipzig Airport (LEJ) is the closest airport. From there you can get to Wintzingerode/Worbis by car. It’s also possible to take a plane to Frankfurt (FRA) and then catch a train to GÃ¶ttingen.

item.title: Locations
item.description: City Hall wedding Rathaus Rentamt Rossmarkt 1 37339 Leinefelde-Worbis (Worbis) Google Maps How to get to the City Hall? If you stay in Worbis: You can probably walk there. Everything is close to each other. It will probably take 10-15 minutes. If you stay in Wintzingerode you can get there by car (5 minutes) or ask us…actually ask Vanessa because Jaime is probably as lost as you are xD There are probably more people coming so we could organize a carsharing.

item.title: Schedule
item.description: City Hall Wedding Date: 25.08.2023 Meeting at the city hall: 1.45pm. We are in Germany, so please be punctual ;) Ceremony: Start at 2pm. End approx. at 2.30pm Time for drinks, taking pictures etc. until 3pm/3.30pm Go to your location and prepare for the Polterabend: Take a nap Go to the toilet Get dressed … Polterabend Start: Around 6pm End: Open end Food and drinks are going to be provided at all time.

Note: if you know how to Google you might be able to find a better deal ðŸ’»
